data.text: 开局就被神明附身成为天使的人间体
data.content: 一个男孩被神明附身，背后展开六翼天使的虚影，周围环绕着神圣的光芒。
data.prompt: Wide shot of a boy, being possessed by a deity with six-winged angelic aura, in a celestial environment, glowing light, realistic style, warm golden tones, divine atmosphere, low angle.
